entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low 6 except plus 1 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6 except plus 1 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late in the evening and dissipating before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
